long_description: Kick the habit of hauling your lunch around in disposable bags and pick up this REI Lunch Sack for years of reuse. Simple bag is sized to carry your lunch. Polyester fabric has a durable PVC-free interior coating that wipes clean. Grab the lunch sack by the 2 loop handles. REI Lunch Sack stuffs into its own internal pocket for simple storage or transportation; packs down to 6 x 4.25 x 2 in.
short_description: Kick the habit of hauling your lunch around in disposable bags and pick up this REI Lunch Sack for years of reuse.
